name: Portal Tanks
description:
Portal, flip, and soar your way onto platforms battling other tanks in this highly (un)realistic 2D tank arena!

There are no bugs, only unexpected features!

Controls - W&D to move, Space to shoot

For QaziJam 9 and Ludum Dare 37

Credits:

Art created by me

Music: "Hyper Dash - Cold Sprint" by demon1000, obtained from http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/716040

Sounds created from sfxr, http://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html
